AccessProfile.tar:Name: Company A employee access 1
AccessProfile.tar:Description: Access is granted to AP1-RA, AP3-BA, AP4-OR, AP4-RO during the employee schedule A

AccessProfile.tar:Name: Company A employee access 2
AccessProfile.tar:Description: Access is granted to AP1-RA, AP3-BA, AP4-OR, AP4-RO during the always on schedule

AccessProfile.tar:Name: Company B employee access
AccessProfile.tar:Description: Access is granted to AP2-RB, AP3-AB, AP4-OR, AP4-RO during the employee schedule B

AccessProfile.tar:Name: Maintenance access
AccessProfile.tar:Description: Access is granted to all access points during the always on schedule

Test.Name: Correct response: number of items in accessProfileCompleteList = cap.MaxLimit
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: Correct response: number of items in accessProfileCompleteList is less than cap.MaxLimit
Correct response: number of items in accessProfileCompleteList is more than cap.MaxLimit
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: A.3: a few iterations with GetAccessProfileList
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: A.3: nextStartReference is not null
Test.Description: Incorrect DUT behaviour: nextStartReference is not null Check Halt button

Test.Name: A.3: a few iterations with GetAccessProfileList - 2
A.3: one GetAccessProfileInfoList is empty
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: A.3: fault to GetAccessProfileInfoList
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: A.3: no response to GetAccessProfileInfoList
Test.Description: ACCESS RULES Service Capabilities was returned

Test.Name: Not all AccessProfiles are returned (MaxLimit=1)
Test.Description: STEP 11 - Checking that requested Access ProfileInfo item is received The DUT returned no Access Profile item though the single item for token 'AccessProfile1' is expected STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Not all AccessProfiles are returned (MaxLimit=3)
Test.Description: STEP 9 - Checking consistency of received Access Profile item's lists The list of Access Profile items received through GetAccessProfiles doesn't contain requested items with the following tokens: , AccessProfile3 STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Two AccessProfiles items with equal token (MaxLimit=3)
Test.Description: STEP 9 - Checking consistency of received Access Profile item's lists The list of Access Profile items received through GetAccessProfiles contains items with the following tokens more than once: , AccessProfile1, AccessProfile1 STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Other AccessProfiles items than requested (MaxLimit=3)
Test.Description: STEP 9 - Checking consistency of received Access Profile item's lists The list of Access Profile items received through GetAccessProfiles contains not requested items with the following tokens: , AccessProfile4 STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Other AccessProfile item than requesed
Test.Description: STEP 14 - Checking that requested Access ProfileInfo item is received The DUT returned no Access ProfileInfo item for token 'AccessProfile2' STEP FAILED

Test.Name: >More AccessProfile items than 1 (the same token)
Test.Description: STEP 14 - Checking that requested Access ProfileInfo item is received The DUT returned several Access Profile items though the single item for token 'AccessProfile2' is expected STEP FAILED

Test.Name: >More AccessProfile items than 1 (different tokens)
Test.Description: STEP 14 - Checking that requested Access ProfileInfo item is received The DUT returned several Access Profile items though the single item for token 'AccessProfile2' is expected STEP FAILED

Test.Name: Correct response: AccessProfile Item with all optional fields
Correct response: AccessPolicy item without EntityType optional field
AccessProfile.Description is presented only in GetAccessProfileList
AccessProfile.AccessPolicy is presented only in GetAccessProfileList
Different AccessProfile.AccessPolicy.Entity values
Test.Description: STEP 12 - Checking received Access Profile item Value of field 'Entity' of AccessPolicy item with ScheduleToken = 'ScheduleToken1' is inconsistent. GetAccessProfileList: EntityToken2. GetAccessProfiles: EntityToken1. STEP FAILED

Test.Name: AccessProfile.AccessPolicy.EntityType is presented only in GetAccessProfileList
Test.Description: STEP 12 - Checking received Access Profile item Value of field 'EntityType' of AccessPolicy item with ScheduleToken = 'ScheduleToken1' is inconsistent. GetAccessProfileList: Type2. GetAccessProfiles: . STEP FAILED
